name: RecordCacheEvents
description:
Record artifacts cache usage events for Vercel.

Use this tool to log cache usage events, including types 'HIT' or 'MISS', and sources 'LOCAL' or 'REMOTE'. Useful for tracking cache performance and usage.

parameters.name: cache_usage_events
parameters.description: An array of cache usage events, each with `sessionId`, `source`, `event`, `hash`, and optionally `duration` for `HIT` events. Use to log `HIT` or `MISS` events with `LOCAL` or `REMOTE` sources.

sessionId.description: A UUID (universally unique identifer) for the session that generated this event.

source.description: One of `LOCAL` or `REMOTE`. `LOCAL` specifies that the cache event was from the user's filesystem cache. `REMOTE` specifies that the cache event is from a remote cache.

event.description: One of `HIT` or `MISS`. `HIT` specifies that a cached artifact for `hash` was found in the cache. `MISS` specifies that a cached artifact with `hash` was not found.

duration.description: The time taken to generate the artifact. This should be sent as a body parameter on `HIT` events.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of. Used to specify which team's cache usage events are being recorded.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. It identifies the specific team within Vercel.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: ci_environment
parameters.description: The continuous integration or delivery environment where this artifact is downloaded.

value_schema.description: The continuous integration or delivery environment where this artifact is downloaded.

parameters.name: is_interactive_shell
parameters.description: Set to 1 if the client is an interactive shell, otherwise set to 0.

value_schema.description: 1 if the client is an interactive shell. Otherwise 0

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: x-artifact-client-ci

value_schema.description: The continuous integration or delivery environment where this artifact is downloaded.

parameters.name: x-artifact-client-interactive
parameters.description: 1 if the client is an interactive shell. Otherwise 0

value_schema.description: 1 if the client is an interactive shell. Otherwise 0
